title: HELP: Can only access blind pick and aram?
body: I don't really know whats wrong. I can only click on Blind pick. Ranked, Draft and Flex won't let me click on it. Twisted Treeline is locked. ARAM is open for me. Anyone have an ideas?

replies.body:
We've seen this issue crop up if there are missing or corrupt files in your game assets. A quick repair should resolve this. Simply click the cog icon in the right right of the client, then hit the *Initiate Full Repair* button. After it's done, close League out and relog.

Let me know if this worked!

On another thread someone recommended launching in Legacy Client to fix it, and that worked for a day, and then earlier today I tried this, worked until I restarted my client. Its a reoccurring bug and its frustrating to have to relaunch 3 times or do a repair, every time I open league.
i didnt do anything to fix it i just logged back on later on and it was all back to normal! so hopefully it doesnt do it again. if it does ill repair the client!
I'm also having this problem. A full repair did not help :c

Yeah i've been having the same problem. Can't play co-op vs Ai, twisted treeline or ranked games. Each game mode shows a lock on them. When you hover over the gamemode, it says "category not available" [Locked Game Modes](http://imgur.com/a/mJppX)
